code: import React from'react';import ServiceCard from'./ServiceCard';import{Col}from'reactstrap';import weatherImg from'../assets/images/weather.png';import guideImg from'../assets/images/guide.png';import CustomizationImg from'../assets/images/customization.png';import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var servicesData=[{imgUrl:weatherImg,title:"Calculate Weather",desc:"Plan ahead with our real-time weather updates."},{imgUrl:guideImg,title:"Best Tour Guide",desc:"Unlock the secrets of your destination with our guides."},{imgUrl:CustomizationImg,title:"Customization",desc:"Personalized travel planning: every detail, every desire."}];var ServiceList=function ServiceList(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:servicesData.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServiceCard,{item:item})},index);})});};export default ServiceList;
